channel.title: ikigai on Leslie TANG
channel.description: Recent content in ikigai on Leslie TANG

item.title: ikigai「生き甲斐」生きがい
item.description:
ikigai. a concept that I’ve heard of, but never truly looked into. Recently, this concept keeps catching my attention on my social media feed, so I decided to delve deeper into it. Given how pervasive media is, the most common association with ikigai is probably the following Venn diagram:
Image From Forbes Article, How To Find Your Ikigai And Transform Your Outlook On Life And Business The concept of ikigai, or rather the ideal that articles seems to focus on, is the achievement of “ikigai”.
